r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: * PCBC-551: Do not complain about missing igbinary on start * PCBC-552: Pass logger to lcb_create to catch all log messages * PCBC-553: Check if crypto provider implements IV and signatures * PCBC-554: Fix search query descending order to use "desc" * PCBC-544: Implement CertAuthenticator for extra checks * Fixes for PHP 7.3
